element.short: Canonical URL of another capability statement this implements
element.definition: Reference to a canonical URL of another CapabilityStatement that this software implements or uses. This capability statement is a published API description that corresponds to a business service. The rest of the capability statement does not need to repeat the details of the referenced resource, but can do so.
element.comment:
HL7 defines the following Services: [Terminology Service](terminology-service.html).

Many [Implementation Guides](http://fhir.org/guides/registry) define additional services.
